About


Symphony is a flexible and extensible MATLAB-based electrophysiology data acquisition system. It provides a framework for writing high-level acquisition routines and an interface to conduct well-organized experiments.

Symphony was originally developed as a product of Physion LLC. The project is now developed and maintained by the Symphony-DAS GitHub organization. Primary contributors include The Rieke Lab, The Murphy Lab, and Physion LLC.
